title.narrative: Support for the Sustainable Energy for All Initiative: Technical assistance facility

description.narrative: The Technical assistance Facility is as an integral part of ESMAP¿s energy access program, which is one of the four components of ESMAP. The TAF is aimed at providing a comprehensive TA package of investment proposals and projects in targeted partner countries to assist them in fulfilling the goals of SE4ALL by 2030. The TA will among others strive to actively involve all relevant stakeholders at national level through a Sector Wide Approach (SWAp). The TAF will provide a multi-year engagement with partner countries in order to identify gaps for preparation of a comprehensive plan for achieving the access goal, building on existing programs and plans. The intention is to implement the TAF program in 20 countries during two phases. The first phase will include up to six countries (included in the present proposal). Subject to the availability of resources, the program may be extended to cover additional 14 countries.
